page.title: 19Denby Dale pie breaks record
page.content: LARGEST 64 DENBY DA S P 9 L ' I 1 E D E 18 L x R 5.75 TONS 6x O 1.5 W FEET .....Funds towards a Village Hall..... {# These MEAT pies were baked: # { #1788 King George III temporary # { # return to sanity # { #1815 Duke of Wellington's Victory # { # over Napoleon # { #1846 Corn Laws Repealed # { #1887 Queen Victoria's Jubilee # { #1896 50th Anniversary of the # { # Repeal of the Corn Laws # { #1928 Raise Â£1000 to endow cot for # { # Huddersfield Royal Infirmary # { #1964 Denby Dale Pie Hall # { ####################################
